title: Computer Vision and Machine Learning Engineer
summary: Imagine what you could do here. At Apple, new ideas have a way of becoming extraordinary products, services, and customer experiences very quickly. Bring passion and dedication to your job and there is no telling what you can accomplish. ...
description: We are looking for a Computer Vision and Deep Learning Engineer who will join us to build Apple’s next generation iPhone and iPad camera algorithms. An ideal candidate should have experience with stereo depth estimation, rendering techniques, deep learning, and be passionate about bringing algorithms from research all the way to a product.
key_qualifications:
3+ years industry experience developing deep learning models for computer vision
Solid understanding and experience in deep learning and classical computer vision
Strong mathematical background
Ability to read and understand research literature
Strong programming, debugging, and design skills
Be able to work independently and with others
Excellent problem-solving, critical thinking, and interpersonal skills applications
education_experience: MS/PhD in Computer Vision, Machine Learning, Computer Science or related fields.
